raw: Time for Europe ETFs on Stimulus Optimism? .
replaced: Time for Europe ETFs on Stimulus Optimism? .

raw: European equities should see a green stretch ahead thanks to the new stimulus and reopening of economies .
replaced: European equities should see a green stretch ahead thanks to the new stimulus and reopening of economies .

raw: The European Commission recently unveiled a plan to borrow 750 billion euros ( $ 826.5 billion ) on the market and then disburse to EU countries , which will include 500 billion euros in grants and 250 billion euros in loans .
replaced: EU recently This a plan to borrow 750 billion euros ( $ 826.5 billion ) on the market and then disburse to EU countries , which will include 500 billion euros in grants and 250 billion euros in loans .

raw: This will help them recover from the coronavirus slump .
replaced: This will help EU countries recover from the coronavirus slump .

raw: Out of the 500 billion euros in loans , 310 billion will be deployed in green and digital transitions .
replaced: Out of the 500 billion euros in loans , 310 billion will be deployed in green and digital transitions .

raw: The initiative has been viewed as incredible as Germany “ had always opposed the idea of jointly - issued debt , even during previous crises , ” per CNBC .
replaced: The initiative has been viewed as incredible as Germany “ had always opposed the idea of jointly - issued debt , even during previous crises , ” per CNBC .

raw: Austria , the Netherlands , Sweden and Denmark , however , are against the concept of grant .
replaced: Austria , the Netherlands , Sweden and Denmark , however , are against the concept of grant .

raw: Instead , they support the loan format and seek economic reform commitments in response to any financial aid , CNBC noted .
replaced: Instead , Austria , the Netherlands , Sweden and Denmark support the loan format and seek economic reform commitments in response to any financial aid , CNBC noted .

raw: The allocation of these funds will be done via the European budget , which is a common basket that receives aids from all 27 member countries and finances various projects across the Eurozone .
replaced: The allocation of these funds will be done via the EU budget .

raw: Investors should expect a strict negotiation among countries in the coming days .
replaced: Investors should expect a strict negotiation among countries in the coming days .

raw: In order to finance some of the incremental costs , the European Commission proposed implementing a carbon border duty , a tax on plastics , a common consolidated corporate tax base and a digital tax .
replaced: In order to finance some of the incremental costs , EU proposed implementing a carbon border duty , a tax on plastics , a common consolidated corporate tax base and a digital tax .

raw: It also proposed that the EU budget should receive a bigger share of the Value Added Tax paid by governments to the EU .
replaced: EU also proposed that the EU budget  EU budget should receive a bigger share of the Value Added Tax paid by governments to EU .

raw: Investors should note that apart from the latest stimulus plan , the ECB launched an $ 820 billion coronavirus package in March .
replaced: Investors should note that apart from the latest stimulus plan , EU launched an $ 820 billion coronavirus package in March .

raw: Apart from this , the ECB restarted QE from November 2019 and has a negative interest in place ( read : ETFs to Gain on ECB 's Coronavirus Emergency Stimulus Rollout ) .
replaced: Apart from this , EU restarted QE from November 2019 and has a negative interest in place ( read : ETFs to Gain on EU Coronavirus Emergency Stimulus Rollout ) .
